samples.en: The patient became a bit better after taking some medicine.
samples.cn: 服药后，病人感觉好点了。

samples.en: Danny has worked as newspaper reporter for a couple of years.
samples.cn: 丹尼担任报社记者已有几年了。

samples.en: Apple is a kind of fruit.
samples.cn: 苹果是一种水果。

samples.en: This shop sells all kinds of watches from different countries.
samples.cn: 这家商店出售来自不同国家的各种手表。

samples.en: Although the World Expo was over, a l otof visitors still go to the China Pavilion to enjoy
themselves and take photos.
samples.cn: 虽然世博会结束了，但还是有很多游客去中国馆参观、拍照。

samples.en: There is a pair of glasses on the desk.
samples.cn: 桌子上有一副眼镜。

samples.en: What an important piece of information it is!
samples.cn: 这是一个多么重要的信息！

translation: 首先，尤其; 最重要的是

samples.en: Above all Susie is a good and tireless writer.
samples.cn: 首要的一点，苏茜是一位优秀的、不知疲倦的作家。

translation: 按照；根据；按(……所报道)；依照；据(……所说)

samples.en: According to the traffic rules, a baby can not sit on an adult’s lap in a car.
samples.cn: 根据交通规则，婴儿不能坐在车内成年人的腿上。

info:
名师点拨 according to 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：according to sb. 与 in one’s opinion 意思相同，在句中可以
互换。

samples.en: Don’t add too much sugar to the cake, or it will be too sweet.
samples.cn: 别在蛋糕里加太多糖，否则就太甜了。

samples.en: He failed after all.
samples.cn: 最终他还是失败了。

samples.en: After all, practice makes perfect, so keep working on improving your skills.
samples.cn: 毕竟，熟能生巧，所以继续努力提高你的技能吧。

samples.en: I agree with you.
samples.cn: 我同意你的意见。

info:
名师点拨 agree with sb. 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：agree with sb. 与 have the same opinion with sb. 意思相同，
在句中可以互换。

samples.en: He was very well thought of all over the district.
samples.cn: 他在整个地区评价很高。

info:
名师点拨 all over 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：all over 与 everywhere 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: All right, I accept your apology.
samples.cn: 好吧，我接受你的道歉。

samples.en: Did you run all the way here?
samples.cn: 你是一路跑来的吗？

samples.en: Disneyland is an amusement park.
samples.cn: 迪士尼是一个游乐园。

samples.en: She spends her day doing housework, watching television, reading, and so on.
samples.cn: 她用一天的时间来做家务、看电视、看书，等等。

samples.en: You must apologize to her for having kept her waiting.
samples.cn: 让她等了这么久，你必须为此向她道歉。

info:
名师点拨 apologize to sb. for sth. 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转
换练习中，所以学生一定要知道：apologize to sb. for sth. 与 say sorry to sb. for
sth. 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: I arrive in Shanghai.
samples.cn: 我到上海了。

info:
名师点拨 arrive at/in a place 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练
习中，所以学生一定要知道：arrive at/in a place 与 get to/reach a place 意思相同，
在句中可以互换。

samples.en: The food in Shanghai is not as hot as that in Sichuan.
samples.cn: 上海的食物不像四川的食物那么辣。

info:
名师点拨 as…as 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要掌握其用法：
A is not as/so + 形容词的原级 as B = B is + 形容词的比较级 than A。
例如：The traffic in the countryside is not as/so convenient as that in the city.
= The traffic in the city is more convenient than that in the countryside.
城市的交通比农村的交通方便。
Australia doesn’t have as many people as China.
= Australia has fewer people than China.
= China has more people than Australia.
澳大利亚的人口比中国的少。

samples.en: It’s okay to disagree as long as we respect each other’s views.
samples.cn: 只要我们尊重彼此的观点，有不同意见没关系。

samples.en: As soon as George heard the bad news, his face turned pale.
samples.cn: 乔治一听到坏消息，脸色就变得煞白。

samples.en: She sings beautifully, and she can dance as well.
samples.cn: 她歌唱得好，也会跳舞。

samples.en: It is wonderful playing sports in this club and I have made lots of friends as well.
samples.cn: 在这个俱乐部里运动太棒了，我还结交了很多朋友。

samples.en: Miss Wu is our class teacher and our friend as well. = Miss Wu is not only our class teacher but also our friend.
samples.cn: 吴小姐不仅是我们的老师，还是我们的朋友。

samples.en: I’ll ask for your help if I can’t work out the problem.
samples.cn: 如果我解不出这题，我会请你帮忙。

samples.en: My family talk to each other at breakfast/lunch/supper.
samples.cn: 我的家人在早/午/晚餐时交流。

translation: 起先；开始的时候/最后；终于

samples.en: The election went against him at first, but he won at last.
samples.cn: 选举开始时对他不利，但最终他获胜了。

samples.en: I have nothing to do at home.
samples.cn: 我在家没事可做。

samples.en: If all businesses go paperless, at least one million tons of paper will be saved.
samples.cn: 如果所有的企业实现无纸化，至少能节省 100 万吨的纸。

samples.en: The work will be completed inside four hours at most.
samples.cn: 这项工作至多在 4 小时内完成。

samples.en: I’m leaving for Rome at once.
samples.cn: 我马上去罗马。

info:
名师点拨 at once 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：at once 与 immediately 或 right now, right away 意思相同，在句
中可以互换。

samples.en: More and more foreigners are living and working in Shanghai at present.
samples.cn: 目前越来越多的外国人在上海生活和工作。

info:
名师点拨 at present 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：at present 与 for the time being 或 now 意思相同，在句中可
以互换。
例如：You can leave your suitcase at present.
= You can leave your suitcase for the time being.
= Now, you can leave your suitcase.
现在你可以放下你的手提箱。

samples.en: At the end of August, many students are doing their homework in a hurry.
samples.cn: 在 8 月底，许多学生在赶作业。

samples.en: When playing basketball, we can enjoy the sunshine and fresh air at the same time.
samples.cn: 打篮球时，我们可以同时享受阳光和新鲜的空气。

samples.en: Willy doesn’t do any housework with his mum at weekends.
samples.cn: 威利周末不跟他妈妈一起做任何家务。

samples.en: I’m at work.
samples.cn: 我正在工作。

translation: 以……为依据；以……为基础；基于

samples.en: Success is based on diligence.
samples.cn: 成功是建立在勤奋的基础上的。

samples.en: If you save a few coins every day, you’ll be able to buy a mobile in a year.
samples.cn: 如果你每天节省几个硬币，你就可以在一年内购买一部手机。

info:
名师点拨 be able to 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要掌握以下固定搭配。
I am not able to do = It is impossible for me to do, 在句中可以互换。
例如：I am not able to run the 100-metre race within 14 seconds.
= It is impossible for me to run the 100-metre race within 14 seconds.
我不可能在 14 秒内跑完 100 米比赛。

samples.en: Chemistry isn’t very difficult. You needn’t be afraid of it. You can come and ask for help.
samples.cn: 化学不是很难。你不必害怕。你可以来寻求帮助。

samples.en: “Tom, don’t be afraid of speaking in public. You are no longer a small boy,” said Mum.
samples.cn: 妈妈说：“汤姆，不要害怕在公众场合讲话。你不再是个小男孩了。”

info:
名师点拨 be afraid of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：be afraid of 与 frighten 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: My father was extremely angry with me when he came back from the parents meeting last
week.
samples.cn: 上周父亲开完家长会回来，对我非常生气。

samples.en: Just be aware of how you are breathing.
samples.cn: 只需要意识到自己是如何呼吸的就可以了。

samples.en: It is bad for your health.
samples.cn: 这个对你的健康有害。

info:
名师点拨 be bad for 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：be bad for 与 be harmful to 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: He was born in Shanghai in 1979.
samples.cn: 他 1979 年在上海出生。

samples.en: 谚语 Better be born lucky than wise.
samples.cn: 生不逢时，聪明无用。

samples.en: Many students have to give up their hobbies because they are busy with their studies.
samples.cn: 许多学生因为忙于学业，不得不放弃自己的兴趣爱好。

samples.en: He is busy preparing for the examination.
samples.cn: 他正忙着准备考试。

samples.en: Be careful with this knife, Richard, or you’ll hurt yourself.
samples.cn: 理查德，小心这把刀，否则你会伤到自己。

info:
名师点拨 be careful with 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：be careful 与 take care 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: His illness is believed to be connected to bad habits.
samples.cn: 他的病被认为与不良习惯有关。

samples.en: What makes you suppose him to be connected with them?
samples.cn: 什么使你想到他和他们有联系？

samples.en: The earth is covered with water.
samples.cn: 地球被水覆盖。

samples.en: The textbooks you’re using are different from ours.
samples.cn: 你们使用的课本和我们的不同。

info:
名师点拨 be different from 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：be different from 与 be not the same as 意思相同，在
句中可以互换。

samples.en: The Oriental Pearl TV Tower is familiar to all Shanghai citizens.
samples.cn: 东方明珠电视塔对所有上海市民来说都很熟悉。

samples.en: Drivers should be very familiar with the traffic signs and rules.
samples.cn: 司机应该通晓交通标志和规则。

info:
名师点拨 be/get familiar to/with 是常考词组，所以学生要道：be/get familiar to 和
be/get familiar with 的用法区别。
be/get familiar to 对某人来说是熟悉的(主语是人或物)
be/get familiar with 熟悉某物或某人(主语是人)
例如：Beijing is familiar to me. 北京对我来说很熟悉。
I’m familiar with Beijing. 我很熟悉北京。

samples.en: The Bund is famous for its attractive night views.
samples.cn: 外滩是以其迷人的夜景而闻名的。

samples.en: Teenagers are very fond of cartoons.
samples.cn: 青少年非常喜欢漫画。

samples.en: 谚语 Others may be fond of titles and honors, but I am not.
samples.cn: 人皆好名，我则不然。

info:
名师点拨 be fond of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：be fond of 与 be keen on 或 enjoy 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: The hall is full of people.
samples.cn: 大厅里挤满了人。

info:
名师点拨 be full of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：be full of 与 be filled with 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: Tim is good at singing and doing magic, so he is very popular at his friends’ parties.
samples.cn: 蒂姆擅长唱歌和变魔术，所以他在朋友的聚会上非常受欢迎。

samples.en: He is poor at Chinese.
samples.cn: 他的语文学科比较差。

info:
名师点拨 be good/poor at 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：be good at 与 do well in 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: Steve Jobs was interested in computers when he was very young.
samples.cn: 史蒂夫·乔布斯很年轻时就对电脑感兴趣了。

samples.en: Angel is keen on all kinds of pop music.
samples.cn: 安杰尔喜爱各种流行音乐。

samples.en: If John doesn’t get up immediately, he will be late for the meeting. = Unless John gets up immediately, he will be late for the meeting.
samples.cn: 如果约翰不马上起床，他开会将要迟到了。

samples.en: John, please don’t be late for school again. = You mustn’t come to school late again, John.
samples.cn: 约翰，上学请别再迟到了。

samples.en: Where will the Olympic Park be located?
samples.cn: 奥林匹克公园将建在哪儿？

samples.en: The bakery is located in the new shopping centre.
samples.cn: 这家面包店位于新的购物中心内。

samples.en: His house is located on the edge of the city.
samples.cn: 他的房屋坐落在市区的边缘。

info:
名师点拨 be located (in/on/at) 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练
习中，所以学生一定要知道：be located in 与 lie in 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: The earth is mainly made of iron and silicon and things like that.
samples.cn: 地球主要由铁、硅之类的物质构成。

info:
名师点拨 be made of 是常考词组，所以学生一定要掌握其用法，及比较与 be made
from 和 be made into 的用法区别：
be made of 的意思是“由……制成”，表示制成成品后，仍可看出原材料是什
么，保留原材料的质地形状，制作过程仅发生了物理变化。主语是成品，of
后面是原材料。
be made from 的意思是“用……制成”，表示制成的东西完全失去了原材料的
外形或特征，或原材料在制作过程中发生了化学变化，在成品中已无法辨认。
主语是成品，from 后面是原材料。
be made into 的意思是“被制成”，是被动形式。所以主语是原材料，into 后面
是成品。
例如：The desks and chairs are made of wood. 这些课桌椅都是由木头制成的。
This kind of wine is made from rice. 这种酒是由米酿成的。
注意：be made into, be made from 和 make…into… 在许多时候可互换使用。
例如：Wood can be made into paper. 木材可以制成纸。
= Paper can be made from wood. 纸可以用木材制造。
= We can make wood into paper. 我们可以把木材制成纸。

samples.en: The organisation is made up of ten people.
samples.cn: 这个组织由 10 人组成。

info:
名师点拨 be made up of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：be made up of 与 consist of 意思相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：Desktop computers are made up of three main parts.
= Desktop computers usually consist of three main parts.
台式电脑是由三个主要部件组成的。

samples.en: Helen’s teacher was so pleased with the great progress she made this term.
samples.cn: 海伦的老师对她这学期取得巨大进步很满意。

samples.en: We are so pleased with what they have done in the Paris Olympic Games.
samples.cn: 我们对他们在巴黎奥运会上的表现很满意。

info:
名师点拨 be pleased with 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：be pleased with 与 be satisfied with 或 be happy about
意思相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：I think the young man will be pleased with this new type of suitcase.
= I think the young man will be satisfied with/will be happy about this new
type of suitcase. 我认为年轻人会对这个新型手提箱满意的。

samples.en: All of us are proud of the great changes in Shanghai. We’re sure Shanghai will be even
better tomorrow.
samples.cn: 我们都为上海的巨大变化而感到骄傲。我们相信上海的明天会更好。

samples.en: The order will be ready for delivery next week.
samples.cn: 这批订货将于下周备好待发。

info:
名师点拨 be ready for 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：be ready for 与 get ready for 或 prepare for 意思相同，在句
中可以互换。

samples.en: A headmaster is the person who is responsible for a school.
samples.cn: 校长是学校的负责人。

info:
名师点拨 be responsible for 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练
习中，所以学生一定要知道：be responsible for 与 take charge of 意思相同，在句
中可以互换。

samples.en: Alex was satisfied with Julia’s honesty.
samples.cn: 亚历克斯对朱丽亚的诚实很满意。

info:
名师点拨 be satisfied with 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：be satisfied with 与 be pleased with 意思相同，在句中
可以互换。

samples.en: We expected them to be more similar to one another.
samples.cn: 我们期望它们彼此间会更相似。

samples.en: One should be strict with oneself.
samples.cn: 一个人应该严格要求自己。

samples.en: The whole conference as totally disorganised and nobody knew where they were supposed
to be or what they were supposed to be doing.
samples.cn: 整个会议安排混乱无序，既没人知道该
坐哪里，也没人知道该做什么。

samples.en: Louise won the first prize in a maths contest. We were surprised at the news.
samples.cn: 路易斯获得了数学竞赛一等奖。我们对这一消息感到惊讶。

samples.en: I am thankful to you for all this help.
samples.cn: 感谢你的所有帮助。

samples.en: My grandmother used to wash clothes by hand, but now she is used to doing it with the
washing machine.
samples.cn: 我的祖母过去常常用手洗衣服，但现在她习惯用洗衣机了。

samples.en: Jenny stays with a Chinese family for two years. Now she’s used to the life in China.
samples.cn: 詹妮在一个中国家庭暂住了两年。现在她习惯了在中国的生活。

info:
名师点拨 be used to 是常考词组，所以学生一定要掌握以下固定搭配及用法：
1) sb. be used to 跟动名词或名词，表示“某人习惯做某事”。
2) sth. be used to 跟动词原形，表示“被用来做某事”(= sth. be used for doing sth.)。
3) sb. used to 跟动词原形，表示“某人过去习惯做某事”。

samples.en: I came back because of the rain.
samples.cn: 因为下雨我就回来了。

samples.en: Aunt Liu says these books aren’t hers. They belong to the gentleman over there.
samples.cn: 刘阿姨说这些书不是她的。书属于那边那位绅士。

samples.en: It might not seem like a big deal, but it can have an effect on how you see yourself and
how others see you.
samples.cn: 这也许并不是什么重要的事情，却可以对你如何看待自己以及他
人如何看待你产生影响。

samples.en: Both Rose and Danny went to the car exhibition yesterday. = Rose went to the car exhibition yesterday. Danny went there, too.
samples.cn: 罗斯和丹尼昨天都去了汽车展览会。

info:
名师点拨 both…and… 是常考词组，所以学生一定要掌握以下固定搭配及用法。
1) both…and… 构成的词组作主语时，谓语动词用复数。
2) both…and… 改为否定句时，要用 neither…nor…。谓语动词遵循就近原则。
例如：Both his parents and he have already seen the film.
他和他的父母都看过这部电影了。
Neither his parents nor he has seen the film yet.
他和他的父母都没看过这部电影。

samples.en: The virus caused the computer to break down (= stop working).
samples.cn: 病毒导致计算机出故障了。

samples.en: A thief broke into the shop in our neighbourhood last night and stole several expensive items.
samples.cn: 昨晚一个小偷闯进了我们街区的商店，偷走了好几件贵重物品。

samples.en: I go to Beijing by bus/train/plane.
samples.cn: 我乘公共汽车/火车/飞机去北京。

samples.en: Among all the Christmas cards, mine is the best. I made it by myself.
samples.cn: 在所有的圣诞贺卡中，我的圣诞贺卡是最好的。这是我亲手做的。

samples.en: By the way, what time is it?
samples.cn: 顺便问一下，现在几点了？

samples.en: Calm down, there’s nothing to worry about.
samples.cn: 你冷静一下，没有什么可焦虑的。

samples.en: Lucy thinks young people can learn how to care for others by keeping pets.
samples.cn: 露西认为，年轻人饲养宠物可以从中学习如何照顾他人。

samples.en: I don’t much care for sweets.
samples.cn: 我不太喜欢吃糖果。

info:
名师点拨 care for 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：care for 与 look after 或 take care of 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: The weather in spring is so changeable that many of us have caught a cold.
samples.cn: 春天的天气多变，我们中有很多人都感冒了。

samples.en: Nothing can make me change my mind.
samples.cn: 什么也不能使我改变主意。

samples.en: I want to check in.
samples.cn: 我想办理登机手续。

samples.en: I come from China.
samples.cn: 我来自中国。

samples.en: Come on!
samples.cn: 快来！

samples.en: I think he will come to no good end.
samples.cn: 我认为他没有好下场。

samples.en: 谚语 All good things must come to an end.
samples.cn: 天下没有不散的筵席。

info:
名师点拨 come to an end 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：come to an end 与 complete, finish, be over 意思相同，
在句中可以互换。

samples.en: All things will come true if you can become hard-working.
samples.cn: 只要努力，一切都会实现。

translation: 想出(主意或计划)；提出；赶上

samples.en: Several of the members have come up with suggestions of their own.
samples.cn: 有几位成员提出了自己的建议。

samples.en: Computers are used to help us communicate with others easily.
samples.cn: 电脑能帮助我们轻松地与他人进行交流。

samples.en: Lin Lin often communicates with her American friend to practise English. = Lin Lin often practises English by communicating with her American friend.
samples.cn: 琳琳经常通过与她的美国朋友交流来练习英语。

info:
名师点拨 communicate with 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练
习中，所以学生一定要知道：communicate with 与 keep in touch with 意思相同，
在句中可以互换。

samples.en: She competed with her rival for a prize.
samples.cn: 她与对手为了奖品展开竞争。

samples.en: He never complained about working overtime.
samples.cn: 他从来不抱怨加班。

samples.en: Does the new product consist of four main parts inside?
samples.cn: 这个新产品主要由四部分组成吗？

samples.en: He cut the tree down.
samples.cn: 他把这棵树砍倒了。

samples.en: Why did Jeff cut down the expenses on clothes?
samples.cn: 为什么杰夫减少了在衣服上的花销？

samples.en: You must cut down on sugar to lose weight.
samples.cn: 你必须少吃糖以减轻体重。

samples.en: She spent years dealing with an unsolved case from history.
samples.cn: 她花费数年时间处理了一个未解决的陈年旧案。

samples.en: Would you please tell me how I should deal with it for the time being? = Would you please tell me how to deal with it for the time being?
samples.cn: 请您告诉我该怎么处理眼下这件事？

samples.en: A friend is somebody that we can depend on when we are in trouble.
samples.cn: 朋友是我们在遇到麻烦时可以依靠的人。

info:
名师点拨 depend on 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：depend on 与 rely on 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: People are dying of cancer more and more often.
samples.cn: 死于癌症的人越来越多了。

samples.en: Don’t do harm to animals.
samples.cn: 别伤害动物。

samples.en: We did our best, but he is still not pleased with us.
samples.cn: 我们尽力了，可他还是对我们不满意。

samples.en: Did the doctors do their best to operate on the wounded?
samples.cn: 这些医生尽最大努力为伤员动手术了吗？

samples.en: Do me a favour and close the window.
samples.cn: 帮我把窗户关上。

info:
名师点拨 do sb. a favour 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：do sb. a favour 与 help sb./give sb. a hand 意思相同，
在句中可以互换。

samples.en: Can you do some shopping for me?
samples.cn: 你能替我买些东西吗？

samples.en: I wouldn’t dream of studying abroad in the near future.
samples.cn: 近期内我不考虑出国留学。

info:
名师点拨 dream of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：dream of 与 think of 或 think about 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: They all dressed up to take part in the New Year’s party.
samples.cn: 他们都盛装打扮，去参加新年晚会。

samples.en: John and Mary had known each other pretty well before they got married.
samples.cn: 约翰和玛丽结婚前已经相当了解对方了。

samples.en: Miss Green is kind and patient. She always encourages Roddy to put up his hand in her
class.
samples.cn: 格林老师和善又耐心。在她的课上她总是鼓励罗迪举手发言。

translation: 过得愉快；过得快乐；玩得高兴

samples.en: At the yesterday’s English Evening, all of us enjoyed ourselves.
samples.cn: 昨天的英语晚会上，我们都玩得很开心。

info:
名师点拨 enjoy oneself 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：enjoy oneself 与 have a good time 意思相同，在句中可以
互换。

samples.en: I can fall asleep anytime and anywhere.
samples.cn: 随时随地我都能入睡。

samples.en: He lives far away (from us).
samples.cn: 他住的地方(离我们)很远。

samples.en: He helped us to fill in a big gap in our knowledge.
samples.cn: 他帮我们填补了知识上的巨大空白。

samples.en: You can look up the dictionary and find out the meaning of the word.
samples.cn: 你可以查询词典找出这个词的意思。

samples.en: We need to focus our efforts on getting the work down.
samples.cn: 我们需要集中精力完成这项工作。

samples.en: For example, the performance of actors and actresses is very important in your film.
samples.cn: 例如，在你的电影中，演员的表现是非常重要的。

info:
名师点拨 for example 和 such as 的意思都是“例如”，但在用法上是有区别的。
for example 的位置较灵活，可放在句首、句中或句尾，通常用逗号与其所列举
的部分隔开，另外，其后面可以是句子，也可以是单词词组。
such as 只能放在其所列举部分的前面，而且不用逗号隔开，后面接的是名词。
例如：For example, a bicycle driven by electricity can avoid pollution.
例如，电动自行车可以避免污染。
There are many sources of air pollution; exhaust fumes, for example.
空气污染源有许多种，例如废气。
He can speak several languages such as English, Japanese and French.
他会说好几种语言，比如英语、日语和法语。

samples.en: You can get it for free.
samples.cn: 你可以免费获取。

samples.en: They tasted defeat for the first time.
samples.cn: 他们第一次尝到失败的滋味。

samples.en: She’s staying with her aunt for the time being.
samples.cn: 她暂时住在她姨妈那里。

samples.en: I can see Hieks at the library from time to time.
samples.cn: 我在图书馆有时能看见希克斯。

translation: 进展；与……相处；和睦相处；关系良好

samples.en: I’m sure you’ll get on well with your classmates if you are kind and friendly to them.
samples.cn: 如果你对同班同学和蔼友好，我敢肯定你会与他们相处融洽的。

samples.en: We should get into the habit of keeping good hours.
samples.cn: 我们应该养成早睡早起的习惯。

samples.en: As soon as he got off the bus, the poor man realized he had left his wallet on it.
samples.cn: 一下车，这个可怜人就意识到他把钱包遗忘在车上了。

samples.en: The bus is coming. Be careful when you get on the bus.
samples.cn: 车来了。上车时小心。

samples.en: Our class teacher asked us if we had got ready for the final exams.
samples.cn: 老师问我们是否已为期末考试做好了准备。

samples.en: Jane gets angry easily. She’d better get rid of it.
samples.cn: 简容易发怒。她最好改掉这个毛病。

info: 近义 give up

samples.en: I never get tired of watching the landscape.
samples.cn: 我对这景色百看不厌。

samples.en: Have we got to the zoo yet?
samples.cn: 我们到动物园了吗？

samples.en: Yesterday morning I got up early so as not to be late for the exam.
samples.cn: 为了考试不迟到，昨天早上我很早起床。

samples.en: The youth gave me his hand when I was lifting my baggage.
samples.cn: 当正要提起行李时，那个年轻人帮了我。

samples.en: You should give up smoking.
samples.cn: 你应该戒烟。

info:
名师点拨 give up 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：give up sth. 与 stop sth. 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

translation: 先走；向前走；去吧；干吧；继续；着手做

samples.en: Cross the street and go ahead.
samples.cn: 过马路，一直往前走。

samples.en:
— Do you mind if I open the window?
— Not at all. Go ahead.
samples.cn:
— 你介意我开窗吗？
— 完全不会，你开吧。

samples.en: I go to the gym for a swim.
samples.cn: 我去健身房游泳。

samples.en: They may go hiking around the island, or swimming in the ocean.
samples.cn: 他们可以环岛徒步旅行或在海里游泳。

samples.en: After the movie, we went home.
samples.cn: 看完电影，我们回家了。

samples.en: Which events is he going in for at the Olympics?
samples.cn: 他将在奥运会上参加什么项目？

samples.en: They wanted me to go in for film work.
samples.cn: 他们要我从事电影工作。

samples.en: Many people go in for golf.
samples.cn: 许多人喜欢打高尔夫球。

info:
名师点拨 go in for 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：go in for 与 take part in 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: Now (that) he is well again, he can go on with his English study.
samples.cn: 现在他既已恢复了健康，就可以继续学习英语了。

info:
名师点拨 go on 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：go on 与 continue 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: Maybe you need to go on a diet.
samples.cn: 或许你应当节食了。

samples.en: Mr. Smith will go on a picnic this Saturday unless the weather is bad.
samples.cn: 史密斯先生将于本周六去野餐，除非天气不好去不了。

samples.en: They went on with their basketball match in spite of the rain.
samples.cn: 他们冒雨继续进行篮球比赛。

samples.en: He went on reading the text.
samples.cn: 他继续读这篇课文。

samples.en: The concert lasted only a few minutes before the power went out.
samples.cn: 音乐会只持续了几分钟就停电了。

samples.en: You may fail to pass the examination unless you do your best to go over the lessons.
samples.cn: 除非你尽力复习，否则你可能无法通过考试。

samples.en: I want to go sailing to relax myself.
samples.cn: 我想去航海放松一下。

samples.en: Since the rain has stopped, why not go shopping now?
samples.cn: 现在既然雨停了，为什么不去购物呢？

samples.en: Did you go sightseeing last Sunday?
samples.cn: 上星期天你是否去观光游览了？

samples.en: It is time for me to go to bed.
samples.cn: 我睡觉的时间到了。

samples.en: I would like all my children to go to college.
samples.cn: 我希望我的孩子们都考上大学。

samples.en: How do you go to school?
samples.cn: 你怎么去上学？

samples.en: I am too excited to go to sleep.
samples.cn: 我太兴奋了，睡不着。

samples.en: She wished to go to the cinema/movie(s) yesterday.
samples.cn: 她昨天想去看电影。

samples.en: After feeling unwell for several days, John decided to go to the hospital.
samples.cn: 难受了几天，约翰决定还是去医院看一下。

samples.en: Your computer will go wrong without any anti-virus software.
samples.cn: 你的电脑没有任何杀毒软件会出问题的。

samples.en: Children must be educated to serve their country when they grow up.
samples.cn: 必须教育孩子长大后为国家效力。

samples.en:
— You’d better read English newspapers more often if you want to improve your reading ability.
— Thanks. I’ll take your advice.
samples.cn:
— 如果你想提高阅读能力，你最好还是多阅读英文报纸。
— 谢谢！我会接受你的建议。

samples.en: You had better not forget to bring a power bank when you travel.
samples.cn: 你去旅行最好不要忘了带充电宝。

samples.en: What a disappointing excuse you’ve made when failing to hand in your project on time!
samples.cn: 你没能按时交项目，找的借口太让人失望了！

samples.en: We happened to discover that we had a friend in common.
samples.cn: 我们碰巧发现我们有一个共同的朋友。

samples.en: An odd thing happened to him this morning.
samples.cn: 他今天早晨遇到一件怪事。

samples.en: I am afraid I must be going now. I have a class at ten.
samples.cn: 我想我现在得走了。我 10 点有课。

samples.en: You have eight lessons every day, don’t you?
samples.cn: 你每天有 8 节课，不是吗？

translation: 玩得很愉快；过得很愉快

samples.en: We had a very good time at the evening party.
samples.cn: 我们在晚会上玩得很愉快。

info:
名师点拨 have a good time 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：have a good time 与 enjoy oneself 意思相同，在句中
可以互换。
例如：I hope you’ll have a good time during your stay in Paris next month.
= I hope you’ll enjoy yourself/yourselves during your stay in Paris next month.
我希望你/你们下个月在巴黎期间能度过一个美好时光。

samples.en: Peter doesn’t have breakfast at school every day.
samples.cn: 彼得不是每天都在学校用早餐的。

samples.en: I have no idea what to do.
samples.cn: 我不知道该怎么办。

info:
名师点拨 have no idea 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：have no idea 与 don’t know 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: I always have pity on the beggars.
samples.cn: 我总是对乞丐心怀怜悯。

samples.en: Does he have sports every day?
samples.cn: 他每天运动吗？

samples.en: You’ve got to come.
samples.cn: 你必须来。

samples.en: I hear from her every week.
samples.cn: 我每星期都能收到她的来信。

info:
名师点拨 hear from 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：hear from sb. 与 receive a letter from sb. 意思相同，在句中可
以互换。

samples.en: I heard of his death last week.
samples.cn: 我上周听说了他的死讯。

samples.en: Jane will help me with the maths problem.
samples.cn: 简将帮助我做数学题。

samples.en: We went here and there looking for berries.
samples.cn: 我们四处寻找浆果。

info:
名师点拨 here and there 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：here and there 与 everywhere 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: We’ll hold a meeting to exchange experiences.
samples.cn: 我们将开个会来交流一下经验。

samples.en: Could you please hold on?
samples.cn: 请别挂电话好吗？

info:
名师点拨 hold on 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：hold on 与 wait for a moment 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: I can hold my breath for about one minute.
samples.cn: 我大约可以憋气一分钟。

samples.en: They have huge amounts of money.
samples.cn: 他们很有钱。

info:
名师点拨 huge amounts of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：huge amounts of 与 plenty of, a lot of 或 much 意思相
同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: Please dress up in a hurry!
samples.cn: 请快点打扮！

info:
名师点拨 in a hurry 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：do sth. in a hurry 与 hurry to do sth. 或 do sth. hurriedly 意思相
同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: The English teacher isn’t here. She has gone to the office and she will be back in a minute.
samples.cn: 英语老师不在这里。她已经去了办公室，一会儿就回来。

samples.en: In addition, you can get to know a circle of people at your age while playing sports.
samples.cn: 另外，在运动时，你可以认识一群同龄人。

samples.en: There are fifteen books on the first shelf, twenty-one on the second, that makes thirty-six
in all.
samples.cn: 书架的第一层有 15 本书，第二层有 21 本书，总共是 36 本书。

info:
名师点拨 in all 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以学
生一定要知道：in all 与 altogether 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: In brief, my hometown is a place which is worthy of being visited.
samples.cn: 简而言之，我的家乡是一个值得游览的地方。

samples.en: The teacher is in charge of the class.
samples.cn: 这位教师负责这个班。

info:
名师点拨 in charge of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：be in charge of 与 manage 意思相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：Mr. Brown is in charge of a large Disneyland Park in Japan.
= Mr. Brown manages a large Disneyland Park in Japan.
布郎先生负责管理日本一家大型迪士尼乐园。

samples.en: Tom pays attention in class.
samples.cn: 汤姆上课非常专心。

samples.en: Did the Red Cross provide any medical services to the victims in danger?
samples.cn: 红十字会是否为处于危险中的受害者提供医疗服务？

samples.en: He wrote a report in English yesterday.
samples.cn: 昨天他用英语写了一份报告。

samples.en: In fact, he has gone abroad.
samples.cn: 事实上，他出国了。

samples.en: Are you in favour of this plan?
samples.cn: 你赞成这个计划吗？

samples.en: Jane felt nervous when she made her first speech in front of the whole school.
samples.cn: 当简在全校师生面前第一次演讲时，她感到紧张。

samples.en: He was in hospital in Washington.
samples.cn: 他在华盛顿住院了。

samples.en: Professor Brown is still very active and enjoys hiking even though he is already in his
fifties.
samples.cn: 尽管布朗教授已经 50 多岁了，他仍然非常活跃，喜欢徒步旅行。

info:
名师点拨 in one’s fifties 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：in his sixties 与 when he was over sixty 意思相同，在句中
可以互换。
例如：My grandpa began to learn how to use a computer in his sixties.
= My grandpa began to learn how to use a computer when he was over sixty.
我爷爷在他 60 多岁时开始学习如何使用电脑。

samples.en: In my opinion he is not right.
samples.cn: 在我看来，他是错的。

info:
名师点拨 in one’s opinion 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：in one’s opinion 与 I think 意思相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：In my opinion, children can learn about responsibility from doing some housework.
= I think that children can learn about responsibility from doing some housework.
在我看来，孩子们可以从做一些家务中学会被责任心。

samples.en: Jack provided some more evidence in order to prove his point.
samples.cn: 杰克提供了更多证据来证明自己的观点。

info:
名师点拨 in order to 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：in order to do 与 so as to do 或 so that sb. can do 意思相同，
在句中可以互换。
例如：Farmers are using fires to clear the land in order to/so as to plant crops.
= Farmers are using fires to clear the land so that they can plant crops.
农民用火来清理田地以便他们能种植农作物。
Grandma opened the window in order to breathe the fresh air.
= Grandma opened the window so that she could breathe the fresh air.
为了呼吸新鲜的空气，奶奶打开了窗户。
Bob made up his mind to study English hard in order to find a good job.
= Bob made up his mind to study English hard so that he could find a good job.
为了能找到一份好工作，鲍勃决心努力学习英语。

samples.en: He became, in other words, a great hero.
samples.cn: 换句话说，他成了一位伟大的英雄。

samples.en: What did you give him in return?
samples.cn: 你给他什么作为报答呢？

samples.en: Are you surprised when someone looks at you in surprise?
samples.cn: 当有人惊异地看着你时，你感到惊讶吗？

samples.en: Make a plan for your future study, and you will succeed in the end.
samples.cn: 为你未来的学习制定计划，最终你一定会成功。

info:
名师点拨 in the end 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：in the end 与 at last 或 finally 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: He does not know what will happen in the future.
samples.cn: 他不知道将来会发生什么事。

samples.en: He positioned the lamp in the middle of the table.
samples.cn: 他把灯放在桌子中间。

samples.en: The book was banned in the past.
samples.cn: 这本书过去是禁书。

samples.en: What makes him behave in this way?
samples.cn: 是什么原因使他这样做的？

samples.en: You must hurry up or you cannot finish it in time.
samples.cn: 你必须抓紧些，否则你来不及完成。

samples.en: The young policeman always helps the old when they are in trouble.
samples.cn: 这个年轻警察在老人有困难时总会帮助他们。

samples.en: It’s very hot. Why not go for a swim instead of staying in the air-conditioned room?
samples.cn: 天气非常热。为什么不去游泳却待在空调房间里呢？

samples.en: The experienced detective never jumps to a conclusion when dealing with a new case.
samples.cn: 这位经验丰富的侦探处理新案件时从不草率下结论。

samples.en: Oh, my goodness. I left my dictionary in the reading-room just now.
samples.cn: 啊，天哪！我刚才把词典忘在阅览室里了。

info:
名师点拨 just now 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：just now 与 a moment ago 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: I want to keep a diary, but I can’t.
samples.cn: 我想记日记，可我做不到。

samples.en: The machine kept running.
samples.cn: 机器一直在运转。

info:
名师点拨 keep doing sth. 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：keep doing sth. 与 go on doing sth. 意思相同，在句中
可以互换。

samples.en: I practise yoga to keep fit.
samples.cn: 我练瑜伽来保持健康。

samples.en: I don’t want to keep you from your work.
samples.cn: 我不想耽误你的工作。

info:
名师点拨 keep… from 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：keep…from 与 prevent…from 或 stop…from 意思相同，在
句中可以互换。
例如：Sometimes pet dogs bark at night and this keeps/prevents their neighbours from
sleeping.
= Sometimes pet dogs bark at night and this stops their neighbours from sleeping.
有时宠物狗夜间吠叫，这让他们的邻居睡不好觉。

samples.en: How does Jack keep in touch with his friends in America every week?
samples.cn: 杰克每周是如何与美国朋友保持联系的？

samples.en: The policeman told the boys to keep off the grass.
samples.cn: 警察告诉男孩们勿踩草地。

samples.en: If you won’t keep quiet, you can get out!
samples.cn: 如果你不保持安静，那就只好请你出去了！

samples.en: That job will keep you busy for a long time.
samples.cn: 那项工作会使你忙碌很长时间。

samples.en: It’s impolite to laugh at people in trouble.
samples.cn: 嘲笑处于困境中的人们是不礼貌的。

samples.en: The girl came in and laid the table for supper.
samples.cn: 女孩进来，把桌子摆好准备吃晚饭。

samples.en: She learned everything from me.
samples.cn: 她什么都是向我学的。

samples.en: May I leave a message, please?
samples.cn: 请问，我可以留个口信吗？

samples.en: I’ll leave for Beijing tomorrow.
samples.cn: 我明天动身去北京。

samples.en: I had to seek a living before I left secondary school.
samples.cn: 我中学没毕业就去谋生了。

samples.en: The production of this factory is less than that of that factory.
samples.cn: 这个工厂的产量少于那个工厂。

samples.en: He did more than the rest of us did together.
samples.cn: 他做的比我们其余人合在一起做的还要多。

samples.en: I’m talking to you, Jack. Please listen to me carefully.
samples.cn: 杰克，我在跟你说话，请仔细听我讲。

samples.en: She still lives on her parents.
samples.cn: 她仍依靠父母生活。

samples.en: Most of Asians live on rice.
samples.cn: 多数亚洲人以大米为主食。

samples.en: As middle school students, we should know how to look after ourselves.
samples.cn: 作为中学生，我们应该知道如何照顾自己。

info:
名师点拨 look after 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：look after 与 take care of 意思相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：You’d better look after your younger brother, Tom.
= You’d better take care of your younger brother, Tom.
你最好照顾你的弟弟，汤姆。

samples.en: The pupils are all looking at the chart on the wall.
samples.cn: 学生都瞧着墙上的图表。

samples.en: Her sister wanted to further her study instead of looking for a job.
samples.cn: 她妹妹想要继续深造，而不是找工作。

samples.en: Little Adam is looking forward to meeting his friend next week.
samples.cn: 小亚当期待下周见到他的小伙伴。

info:
名师点拨 look forward to 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：look forward to doing sth. 与 expect to do sth. 意思相
同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: He looks like a scholar.
samples.cn: 他看上去像个学者。

samples.en: The police reminded the public to look out for pickpockets in crowded areas.
samples.cn: 警方提醒公众在拥挤区域要提防扒手。

info:
名师点拨 look out 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：look out 与 be careful 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: You’d better not look up every new word in the dictionary because you can guess it from
the context.
samples.cn: 你最好不要用词典去查每一个新词，因为你能从上下文中猜到它的意思。

samples.en: He had to look up to see the top of the skyscraper.
samples.cn: 他不得不抬头才能看到摩天大楼的顶部。

samples.en: He didn’t want to lose his life in the battle field.
samples.cn: 他不想在战场上送命。

info:
名师点拨 lose one’s life 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：lose one’s life 与 die 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: If you don’t take the map with you, you may lose your way to Shanghai Museum. = Take the map with you, and you can find the way to Shanghai Museum.
samples.cn: 如果不带上这张地图，你去上海博物馆可能会迷路。

samples.en: Father lost temper after he was told his daughter stole a mobile phone from her deskmate.
samples.cn: 父亲得知女儿偷了她同桌的手机后，大发脾气。

samples.en: Danny has decided to go on a diet because he wants to lose weight.
samples.cn: 丹尼决定节食，因为他想减肥。

samples.en: You can make a decision right now. You can also think it over for a couple of days.
samples.cn: 你可以现在就做决定，也可以再考虑几天。

samples.en: They want to make a film in Shanghai.
samples.cn: 他们想在上海拍电影。

samples.en: Then we started to make a fire.
samples.cn: 然后我们开始生火。

samples.en: He makes a living by writing.
samples.cn: 他以写作为生。

info:
名师点拨 make a living 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：make a living 与 earn money 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: Tom’s father looked angrily at Tom because he had made so many mistakes.
samples.cn: 父亲生气地看着汤姆，因为他犯了那么多错误。

samples.en: If you make a noise, you’ll scare off the animals.
samples.cn: 如果你弄出声响就会把动物吓跑。

samples.en: Nobody likes to make friends with dishonest people.
samples.cn: 没有人喜欢与不诚实的人交朋友。

samples.en: We should not make fun of the weak.
samples.cn: 我们不应该取笑弱者。

samples.en: We begin to consistently make money.
samples.cn: 我们开始持续地盈利。

samples.en: It’s nice of Andy to help me with my English and I’ve made some progress.
samples.cn: 安迪真好，他帮我学英语。我已经取得了一些进步。

translation: 尽力做到；务请；确保；查明；确信

samples.en: Make sure you have ample (
samples.cn: 足够的) time to prepare for the new day ahead.
你要保证有足够的时间为即将开始的新的一天做好准备。

samples.en: Does she make the bed in the morning?
samples.cn: 她早上整理床铺吗？

samples.en: They made up their minds to sell the house.
samples.cn: 他们决定把房子卖掉。

info:
名师点拨 make up one’s mind 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练
习中，所以学生一定要知道：make up one’s mind 与 decide 意思相同，在句中可
以互换。

samples.en: He forgot the charger for his mobile phone.
samples.cn: 他忘了带手机充电器。

samples.en: I sat next to a girl whose name was Diane.
samples.cn: 我坐在一个名叫黛安的女孩旁边。

samples.en: Tom, you are no longer a little boy. You should learn to be independent. = Tom, you are not a little boy any longer. You should learn to be independent.
samples.cn: 汤姆，你不再是一个小男孩了。你应该学会独立。

info:
名师点拨 no longer/not…any longer 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句
型转换练习中，所以学生一定要知道：no longer/not…any longer 暗含“过去曾
是”used to be 的意思，在句中可以互换。
例如：Shanghai is not a small fishing village any longer.
= Shanghai used to be a small fishing village.
上海再也不是一个小渔村了。

translation: 用来加强语气)一点也不，根本不

samples.en: He is not worried at all.
samples.cn: 他一点都不担心。

samples.en: Now and then we heard shots in the woods.
samples.cn: 我们不时听到从森林里传来的枪声。

info:
名师点拨 now and then/again 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练
习中，所以学生一定要知道：now and then 与 from time to time 意思相同，在句
中可以互换。

samples.en: He was quite polite, of course, but somehow I didn’t like his manner.
samples.cn: 当然，他相当有礼貌，但我就是有点儿不喜欢他的举止。

samples.en:
— May I come with you to see Swan Lake?
— Yes, of course.
samples.cn:
— 我可以和你一起去看《天鹅湖》吗？
— 当然可以。

samples.en: How many times do you dine out per week on average?
samples.cn: 你每星期通常下几次馆子？

samples.en: Has he gone to Paris on business or for pleasure?
samples.cn: 他去巴黎是出差还是游玩？

samples.en: Today they came here on foot. = Today they walked here.
samples.cn: 今天他们是步行过来的。

samples.en: I’m on holiday next week.
samples.cn: 我下周休假。

samples.en: I wish she would be on my side.
samples.cn: 我希望她能站在我这边。

samples.en: He is naughty, but on the other hand, he is clever.
samples.cn: 他是调皮，但另一方面，他很聪明。

samples.en: You are wanted on the phone.
samples.cn: 有人打电话找你。

samples.en: There is little bread in my fridge. Please buy some on your way home.
samples.cn: 冰箱里没有面包了，请你在回家的路上买一些。

samples.en: I didn’t finish the work on time. Alice didn’t finish it, either. = Neither Alice nor I finished the work on time.
samples.cn: 爱丽丝和我都没有准时完成工作。

samples.en: The office is open from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. on weekdays.
samples.cn: 办事处工作日从上午 9 点到下午 5 点开放。

samples.en: Olympic is held once every four years.
samples.cn: 奥运会每四年举办一次。

samples.en: I’ll repeat the question once more.
samples.cn: 我把这个问题再重复一次。

samples.en: They went into the classroom one after another.
samples.cn: 他们一个接一个地走进教室。

samples.en: She went out of the room, taking the flowers with her.
samples.cn: 她带着花走出了房间。

samples.en: A few of the tanks had run out of ammunition.
samples.cn: 有几辆坦克的弹药已经用光了。

samples.en: This kind of machine is out of date.
samples.cn: 这种机器过时了。

samples.en: He performed his experiment over and over, working till midnight.
samples.cn: 他一次次地进行实验直到深夜。

info:
名师点拨 over and over 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：over and over 与 again and again 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: The teacher told the student to pay attention to his spelling.
samples.cn: 老师提醒那个学生要注意拼写。

samples.en: How much did you pay for the book?
samples.cn: 那本书你付了多少钱？

info:
名师点拨 pay for 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：sb. pay money for sth. 与 sb. purchased sth. for money, sb. spend
money on/buying sth. 或 sth. cost sb. money 意思基本相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：Mr. Jones paid 30,000 dollars for a vase last year.
= Mr. Jones purchased a vase for 30,000 dollars last year.
= Mr. Jones spent 30,000 dollars on/buying a vase last year.
= A vase cost Mr. Jones 30,000 dollars last year.
琼斯先生去年花了 3 万美元买了一个花瓶。

samples.en: Let’s pick out the bad potatoes from the basket.
samples.cn: 我们把坏掉的土豆从篮子里挑出来吧。

samples.en: I picked up your book by mistake.
samples.cn: 我错拿了你的书。

samples.en: Watching the old man, she was going to play a trick on him.
samples.cn: 观察了一下这个老人，她决定捉弄他一把。

samples.en: The kid was playing with his ball.
samples.cn: 这个孩子在玩球。

samples.en: She had plenty of imagination.
samples.cn: 她有丰富的想象力。

info:
名师点拨 plenty of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要掌握以下固定搭配的用法：
1) plenty of(很多), a lot of (lots of)(大量)后面可跟可数名词，也可跟不可数名词。
2) a little(一些), much(许多), a great (good) deal of(大量), a large amount of(大量)
后面跟不可数名词。
3) a few(一些), many(许多), a large number of(大量)后面跟可数名词。

samples.en: He pointed out that there was little chance of success.
samples.cn: 他指出成功的机会很少。

samples.en: The teacher praised him highly for his honesty.
samples.cn: 老师大大地表扬了他的诚实。

samples.en: I prefer chemistry to physics.
samples.cn: 我喜欢化学甚于物理。

samples.en: I prefer staying at home to going outside on a wet day.
samples.cn: 下雨天我宁愿待在家里，也不愿外出。

info:
名师点拨 prefer…to 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：prefer…to 与 like…better than 或 would rather do than do 意
思基本相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：Tina preferred watching TV to reading comic books when she was young.
= Tina liked watching TV better than reading comic books when she was young.
= Tina would rather watch TV than read comic books when she was young.
蒂娜小时候宁愿看电视，也不愿看漫画。
I prefer playing sports outdoors to watching TV at home.
= I like playing sports outdoors better than watching TV at home.
= I would rather play sports outdoors than watch TV at home.
我宁愿去做户外运动，也不愿在家看电视。

samples.en: The students in our school are busy preparing for our School Art Festival.
samples.cn: 我们学校的学生正忙着准备学校的艺术节。

samples.en: All of us should try to keep fit and prevent from eating too much.
samples.cn: 我们大家应该努力保持健康，避免吃得过多。

samples.en: Nobody can prevent him from running the risk.
samples.cn: 没有人能够阻止他去冒险。

samples.en: Trees should be well protected from the cold during winter.
samples.cn: 冬天要保护好树木以防冻坏。

samples.en: They provide these children with story books.
samples.cn: 他们给这些孩子们提供故事书。

info:
名师点拨 provide…with 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习
中，所以学生一定要知道：provide with food 与 get food ready(准备食物)意思相
同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: We’ve decided to put off the spring outing till next week because of the bad weather.
samples.cn: 因为天气不好，我们已经决定将春游推迟到下周。

samples.en: 谚语 Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
samples.cn: 今日事，今日毕。

samples.en: Please put on your jacket.
samples.cn: 请穿上夹克衫。

samples.en: A film will put on.
samples.cn: 电影即将上映。

samples.en: The firemen fought bravely and put out the forest fire in the end.
samples.cn: 消防队员英勇奋战，最终扑灭了森林大火。

samples.en: Please put up your hand if you have any questions.
samples.cn: 谁有问题，请举手。

samples.en: We’d better put up a notice here.
samples.cn: 我们最好在这儿贴一张通知。

samples.en: We often refer to these books in our work.
samples.cn: 我们工作中经常参考这些书。

samples.en: Being independent means believing in yourself without relying on others.
samples.cn: 独立意味着相信自己，不依赖他人。

samples.en: When I saw a wolf, I ran away.
samples.cn: 当我看见狼时，拔腿就跑。

samples.en: We have run out of petrol.
samples.cn: 我们的汽油已用完。

info:
名师点拨 run out of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：run out of 与 finish 或 use up 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: He wanted to save her life at all cost.
samples.cn: 他要不惜一切代价挽救她的生命。

samples.en: They searched all the drawers for the missing paper.
samples.cn: 他们翻了所有的抽屉找寻那份遗失的文件。

samples.en: I will see you off at the railway station.
samples.cn: 我会去火车站送你。

samples.en: The shop sold out all its shirts.
samples.cn: 那家商店的衬衫都卖光了。

samples.en: Set out early, or you won’t reach your hometown before midnight.
samples.cn: 早点出发，否则你午夜前到不了家乡。

samples.en: The government has set out to make many needed reforms.
samples.cn: 政府着手进行诸多必要的改革。

samples.en: He warmly shook hands with those customers around the table.
samples.cn: 他和坐在周围的客户热情握手。

samples.en: Nowadays many people share photos with their friends on the Internet.
samples.cn: 现在很多人在互联网上和他们的朋友分享自己的照片。

samples.en: Could you tell me the way to the shopping mall?
samples.cn: 你能告诉我购物中心怎么走吗？

samples.en: She likes to show herself off.
samples.cn: 她喜欢自我炫耀。

samples.en: Before you start to work, I’ll show you around the factory.
samples.cn: 开始工作前，我先领你参观一下工厂。

samples.en: I wish she would shut up!
samples.cn: 她要是闭嘴该多好！

samples.en: So far neither of the parcels I sent has arrived yet.
samples.cn: 到目前为止，我寄的两个包裹都还没到。

samples.en: Speak louder so that everyone in the meeting room can hear you clearly.
samples.cn: 请你大声点，以便会议室的每个人都能清楚地听到你的讲话。

info:
名师点拨 so that 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：so that + 句子与 in order/so as to + 动词原形意思相同，在句中
可以互换。
例如：Kitty practises playing the piano after class so that she can win the competition.
= Kitty practises playing the piano after class in order/so as to win the competition.
为了能赢得比赛，姬蒂下课后练习弹钢琴。
Some girls in my company hardly have supper so that they can lose weight.
= Some girls in my company hardly have supper in order/so as to lose weight.
我公司里有些女孩为了减肥几乎不吃晚饭。

samples.en: Next Monday we will have the last exam for Social Study.
samples.cn: 下星期一我们将进行最后一科——社会研究的考试。

samples.en: In social studies, students learn about the relations of people in a country.
samples.cn: 在社会研究中，学生可以了解一个国家中人与人之间的关系。

samples.en: We will meet again some day.
samples.cn: 我们后会有期。

info:
名师点拨 some day 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：some day 与 one day in future 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: The police will find him sooner or later.
samples.cn: 警方早晚会找到他的。

samples.en: What does N.E. stand for? N.E.
samples.cn: 这两个字母代表的是什么呢？

samples.en: You had better not stay up too late.
samples.cn: 你最好别熬夜太晚。

info:
名师点拨 stay up 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：stay up 与 don’t go to bed 意思相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：Bill stayed up until he finished writing the letter at 11:45 last night.
= Bill didn’t go to bed until he finished writing the letter at 11:45 last night.
比尔昨晚直到 11 点 45 分写完信才去睡觉。

samples.en: AIDS is a kind of dangerous disease. Actions must be taken to stop it from spreading.
samples.cn: 艾滋病是一种危险的疾病。必须采取行动阻止它蔓延。

samples.en: We dislike people such as him.
samples.cn: 我们不喜欢像他这样的人。

samples.en: I seldom watch TV. But I always surf the Internet on weekends.
samples.cn: 我很少看电视。但周末我总是上网。

samples.en: You ought to open your eyes and take a look at reality.
samples.cn: 你应该睁开眼睛去看看现实。

samples.en: Can I take a message for him?
samples.cn: 我能替您给他捎个口信吗？

samples.en: We must take action to keep up with new developments.
samples.cn: 我们必须采取行动来跟上新的发展形势。

samples.en: We had no choice but to take an underground to make it on time.
samples.cn: 为了准时赶到，我们不得不坐地铁。

samples.en: The teacher didn’t leave until all the students were taken away by their parents.
samples.cn: 直到所有的学生都被他们父母接走，老师才离开。

samples.en: You needn’t worry about your son. He can take care of himself.
samples.cn: 你不必担心你的儿子。他会照顾自己。

samples.en: The policeman said he would take charge of the gun.
samples.cn: 那位警察说他负责看管这支枪。

samples.en: She took hold of his hand.
samples.cn: 她握住他的手。

samples.en: We should take notes in class.
samples.cn: 我们上课应该记笔记。

samples.en: Please take off your coat. It’s very hot inside the room.
samples.cn: 请脱下外衣。房间里非常热。

samples.en: The plane took off on time.
samples.cn: 飞机准时起飞。

samples.en: I will take your advice.
samples.cn: 我会听从你的劝告。

samples.en: I take out my glasses from my bag.
samples.cn: 我从包里取出眼镜。

samples.en: I don’t think he will come and take part in the meeting, will he?
samples.cn: 我认为他不会来参加会议，他会来吗？

samples.en: Five hundred students in our school took part in the opening ceremony of the Tourism
Festival.
samples.cn: 我们学校有 500 名学生参加了旅游节的开幕式。

info:
名师点拨 take part in 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要知道：take part in 与 join in 意思相同，在句中可以互换。

samples.en: The accident took place on the fifth day of their journey.
samples.cn: 事故发生在他们旅程的第五天。

samples.en: Most people were sleeping when the big earthquake took place in that area.
samples.cn: 大地震发生时，那个地区的大部分人正在睡梦中。

info:
名师点拨 take place 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所
以学生一定要知道：take place 与 happen(没有被动语态)和 be held 意思相同，在
句中可以互换。
例如：As we all know, the next Olympic Games will take place in Los Angeles.
= As we all know, the next Olympic Games will be held in Los Angeles.
我们都知道，下届奥运会将在洛杉矶举行。
I was told that the car accident took place this morning.
= I was told that the car accident happened this morning.
有人告诉我，今天早上发生了一起车祸。

samples.en: He will take the place of you and go to the meeting.
samples.cn: 他将替你去开会。

samples.en: The lady took up dancing as a hobby in her sixties, and she is really good at it now.
samples.cn: 这位女士 60 多岁开始把跳舞作为一种爱好，现在她的确跳得很好。

samples.en: We talked about what to do.
samples.cn: 我们谈到了该怎么办。

samples.en: Since she joined the sports club, she has become very active and enjoys meeting and
talking to others.
samples.cn: 自从加入体育俱乐部，她就变得很活跃并且喜欢聚会，喜欢与其
他人交谈。

samples.en: Some teenagers don’t like to talk with their parents, but I am different from them. I love
to talk with my parents.
samples.cn: 一些青少年不喜欢跟他们的父母交谈，但我与他们不同。我
喜欢跟我的父母交谈。

samples.en: Can you tell her from her twin sister?
samples.cn: 你能分辨她和她的双胞胎妹妹吗？

samples.en: It is wrong to tell a lie.
samples.cn: 撒谎是不对的。

samples.en: He works in the same workshop as I do.
samples.cn: 他和我在同一个车间干活。

info:
名师点拨 the same…as 是常考句型，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，
所以学生一定要掌握以下句型：
A is the same + 名词 as B 与 A is as + 形容词的原级 as B 意思相同，在句中可以
互换。
例如：This beautiful skirt is the same price as that red scarf.
= This beautiful skirt is as expensive as that red scarf.
这条漂亮的裙子和那条红围巾价格相同。

samples.en: He’ll return to London the week after next.
samples.cn: 他将于下下周返回伦敦。

samples.en: I will think about your suggestion.
samples.cn: 我会考虑你的建议。

samples.en: Will you think of me after I’ve left?
samples.cn: 我离开之后，你会想我吗？

info:
名师点拨 think of 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：What do you think of 与 How do you like 意思相同，可以互换。
例如：What do you think of your new job? = How do you like your new job?
你觉得你的新工作怎么样？

samples.en: Cool yourself, think it over.
samples.cn: 冷静一下，好好想想。

samples.en: What a waste to throw it away!
samples.cn: 扔掉它多浪费！

samples.en: To my great joy, my lost watch was found.
samples.cn: 让我极为高兴的是，我那块丢失的手表找到了。

samples.en: To my surprise, he could work out the problem alone. = I was surprised that he could work out the problem by himself.
samples.cn: 令我吃惊的是，他能自己解决这个问题。

samples.en: Mrs. Brown was too old to walk upstairs to the twelfth floor of the building.
samples.cn: 布朗夫人年纪太大，以至于爬不到这幢大楼的 12 层。

info:
名师点拨 too…to 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：too…to 与 not…enough to 和 so…that…can’t… 意思相同，在
句中可以互换。
例如：The maths problems were too difficult for the students to work out.
= The maths problems were not easy enough for the students to work out.
= The maths problems were so difficult that the students couldn’t work them out.
这道数学题太难，学生做不出来。
Robert is too short to reach the pears on the table.
= Robert isn’t tall enough to reach the pears on the table.
= Robert is so short that he can’t reach the pears on the table.
罗伯特太矮，他还够不到桌子上的梨。

samples.en: As a tour guide, it’s important to be knowledgeable about the local culture and landmarks.
samples.cn: 作为一名导游，了解当地文化和地标很重要。

samples.en: I’d like to try on that blue wool coat.
samples.cn: 我想试穿那件蓝色的羊毛外套。

samples.en: “Turn down the radio, Jim. It’s too noisy.” said his grandfather.

samples.cn: 把收音机音量调低，吉姆。太吵了。”他的祖父说。

samples.en: If you are cold, you can turn the heater up.
samples.cn: 如果你觉得冷，你可以把暖气开大。

samples.en: The old building was turned into a library.
samples.cn: 这幢旧房子被改造成了图书馆。

translation: 关掉(电灯、电视、收音机等)

samples.en: When you leave your classroom, remember to turn off the lights.
samples.cn: 当你离开教室时，记得关灯。

translation: 开，旋开(电灯、电视、收音机等)

samples.en: Don’t turn on the MP3 too loud. It’s bad for your ears.
samples.cn: 不要把 MP3 开得太大声。对你的耳朵不好。

samples.en: I imagined solving the problem easily, but it turned out to be much harder.
samples.cn: 我原本以为能轻松解决这个问题，结果却困难得多。

samples.en: It turns out that he was right.
samples.cn: 最后证明他是对的。

samples.en: Turn over, or your back will get sunburnt.
samples.cn: 翻过去，不然你的后背要被阳光灼伤的。

samples.en: He used to be a good movie director but nowadays he is only busy making money.
samples.cn: 他曾经是一位很好的电影导演，但现在他只忙着赚钱。

samples.en: Although Edward is over seventy, he still walks as fast as he used to.
samples.cn: 虽然爱德华 70 多岁了，但他仍然和过去一样走得很快。

samples.en: Sarah used to ride a bike to work, but now she drives.
samples.cn: 莎拉过去经常骑车去上班，但现在她开车去。

info:
名师点拨 used to 是常考词组，常出现在保持句意基本不变的句型转换练习中，所以
学生一定要知道：used to do 与 often did 意思相同，在句中可以互换。
例如：They used to play football in our housing estate.
= They often played football in our housing estate.
他们过去经常在我们小区踢足球。

samples.en: He had to wait for a few months for the visa to come through.
samples.cn: 他必须等待几个月才能获得签证。

samples.en: It is time for you to wake up.
samples.cn: 你该醒醒了。

samples.en: What’s more, we became good friends.
samples.cn: 而且我们变成了好朋友。

samples.en: You must use this instrument with great care.
samples.cn: 这种仪器使用时必须非常小心。

samples.en: I will help you with pleasure.
samples.cn: 我很乐意帮助你。

samples.en: I read English magazines with the help of a dictionary.
samples.cn: 我借助词典翻阅英文杂志。

samples.en: With the help of them, we could finish the work in time. = They helped us so much that we could finish the work in time.
samples.cn: 在他们的帮助下，我们能够按时完成这项工作。

samples.en: Jessica worked out/dealt with/solved the physics problems without any help.
samples.cn: 在没有任何帮助的情况下，杰西卡解出了这道物理题。

samples.en: It wasn’t too long before we had worked out a plan acceptable to all.
samples.cn: 没多久我们就制订出一个大家都能接受的计划。

samples.en: The maths problem was so difficult that nobody could work it out. = The maths problem wasn’t easy enough for anybody to work out.
samples.cn: 这道数学题太难了，没人能解答出来。

samples.en: You really don’t have to worry about your weight. You look just right.
samples.cn: 真的，你不必担心你的体重。你看起来正好。

translation: 想要；(表示喜欢、愿意)很想；很愿意

samples.en: Would you like/love to go somewhere?
samples.cn: 你想要去个什么地方吗？

samples.en: They would rather use the colour like orange because it’s much brighter than others.
samples.cn: 他们宁愿使用像橙色这种颜色，因为它比别的颜色鲜艳。
